posts.title: How I pwned pwn.college
posts.bodyText: This post is about the time I found a Cross Site Scripting vulnerability in pwn.college, going into the motivations and how I discovered it along with the remediation.

posts.title: Writeup for my machine: Obscured
posts.bodyText: This post is a writeup for the machine Obscured on tryhackme, which was created by me. It was the first fully fledged machine I created and I learned a lot from the process.
